flavor: "I have experience dealing with these sorts of horrors."
name: Harvey Walters
text:
[reaction] After an investigator at your location draws 1 or more cards from their deck during the investigation phase: That investigator draws 1 card. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Draw 1 card.
back_flavor: Professor Walters began as a devotee of the archaic and obscure, but over the years he has discovered that his knowledge of ancient languages, profane relics, and strange rituals is vital to addressing dangers in the modern day. He is both an avid collector of prehistoric ephemera and a fount of knowledge regarding the bizarre primordial religions that worshipped nightmarish gods eons ago. There is perhaps no sane person alive who knows more about the occult than Harvey. When a supernatural event occurs, Professor Walters brings his considerable resources and experience to bear.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Vault of Knowledge, Thrice-Damned Curiosity, 1 random basic weakness.

name: Vault of Knowledge
text:
Harvey Walters deck only.
Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
[reaction] After you successfully investigate, exhaust Vault of Knowledge and choose an investigator at your location: That investigator draws 1 card.

flavor:
"... I can only hope that my account will not arouse a curiosity greater than sane caution on the part of those who believe me at all."
- H. P. Lovecraft, "At the Mountains of Madness"
name: Thrice-Damned Curiosity
text: Revelation - For every 3 cards in your hand: Take 1 damage.

name: Obsessive
text: Revelation - Put Obsessive into play in your threat area. Forced - When your turn begins: Discard 1 non-weakness card at random from your hand. [action] [action]: Discard Obsessive.

flavor: An augmented mind can memorize entire volumes of books.
name: Arcane Enlightenment
text:
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
You have 1 additional hand slot, which can only be used to hold a [[Tome]] asset.

name: Celaeno Fragments
text:
While you have...
- ...5 or more cards in hand, you get +1 [intellect].
- ...10 or more cards in hand, you get +1 [willpower].
- ...15 or more cards in hand, you get +1 [intellect].

flavor: Do they fear it because of what it will do to them? Or, do they fear it because of what it will do to you?
name: Disc of Itzamna
text: [reaction] When a non-[[Elite]] enemy spawns at your location, discard Disc of Itzamna: Automatically evade that enemy or deal it 2 damage.

name: Encyclopedia
text:
Uses (5 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Encyclopedia and spend 1 secret: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator gets +2 to a skill of your choice until the end of the phase.

name: Feed the Mind
text:
Uses (3 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Feed the Mind and spend 1 secret: Test [intellect] (1). For each point you succeed by (to a maximum of 3), draw 1 card.

name: Forbidden Tome
text:
Uses (5 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Forbidden Tome and spend 1 secret: Draw 1 card. Then, if you have 10 or more cards in your hand and there are no secrets on Forbidden Tome, you may discard it to record in your Campaign Log that "you have translated the tome."

name: Higher Education
text:
While you have 5 or more cards in your hand, Higher Education gains:
"[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [willpower] for this skill test.
[free] Spend 1 resource: You get +1 [intellect] for this skill test."

name: Whitton Greene
text:

[reaction] After you reveal a location or put a new location into play, exhaust Whitton Greene: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for a [[Tome]] or [[Relic]] asset and draw it. Shuffle your deck.

name: Burning the Midnight Oil
text: Investigate. When this action begins, gain 2 resources.

name: Cryptic Writings
text:

[reaction] After you draw Cryptic Writings during your turn: Play it.

text:

Discover 2 clues at your location.

name: Occult Invocation

name: Library Docent

text: Draw 1 card. Shuffle any number of non-weakness cards from your hand into your deck. Then, draw that many cards.

name: Esoteric Atlas
text:

text:
Fast. Play during your turn.
Until the end of the round, add your [intellect] to your [combat] and [agility]. Draw 1 card.

name: Perception
text:

text:
Researched.

text:
